name: DataPointsonElectronicDiscovery
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to regular and unfiltered updates on data discovery and legal discovery from your trusted eDiscovery information source, ComplexDiscovery. This flash briefing highlights selected articles, extracts, research, and reports that may increase and impact your knowledge on the business, people, and technology within the eDiscovery ecosystem. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" to access this briefing. And you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the briefing anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
